about_the_game:
I’m proud to present you my very first game as a part-time solo developer.

Return to Basic Killing is a FPS game that wants to bring back the simple yet awesome gameplay of old school shooters. Think of games like Wolfenstein 3D or Doom, with modern technology and gameplay elements.

Key Features

  • An Alternate History background after World War II.
  • 30 Levels full of content and rooms to explore.
  • Game modes: Classic and Perma-death.
  • Lots of Secret Areas to discover.
  • Classic weapon system: collect ammo and weapons from enemies and environment.
  • Advanced enemy AI that reacts to your actions, sounds and other enemies alerts.
  • Cool Voice Over reactions from our protagonist and enemies.

And, hey, in case you care, there is also a cool background story to all this bloody craziness!
Let's see...

Alternate History

The Second World War has put Europe into flames. After a meeting between Adolf Hitler and Francisco Franco in Hendaya during autumn of 1940, Spain entered the War by abandoning neutrality and joining the Axis. Next year, Portugal breaks his ancestral alliance with England and also joins the Axis.

The Third Reich and the USSR of Stalin sign a non-aggression pact, according to which a steel frontier will be established between their current territories.

After turning the tides of the war in Europe, France is rapidly defeated and Great Britain is under heavy attacks.

By 1944 the Reich finished the war by conquering all remaining territories of Europe, after Great Britain was defeated and a puppet nazi government started ruling the country.

The World becomes divided in three main factions:
The nazi Europe.
The communist Asia.
The free but neutral rest of the World, including the USA.

Your Story

You are Rebekah Razor, a veteran from the International Brigades that fought the fascism in the Spanish Civil War and World War II.

After many victories, she was betrayed and captured during an infiltration in the nazi Germany. She was imprisoned in a fortress, one of the many carved inside mountains, that the Reich used as prisons and human experimentation camps.

After many years of being a prisoner and the focus of many evil experiments, an opportunity arises. It’s now or never, as a path to liberty opens. But the path will have plenty of guards and other, even more dangerous, creatures resulting from evil experiments on human beings.

Coming soon...

Stay tunned for more information very soon!

content_descriptors.notes: This game is about killing enemies. So, you can expect a lot of corpses and blood, basically.

name: Return to Basic Killing
short_description: Kill, kill, kill! Then, kill more in this classics-inspired FPS. Return to the basics of the 90s while you find your way out of a tower along 30 intense, action-packed levels. And, hey, in case you care, there is also a background story to all this bloody craziness!
